other_title: Mille emozioni tra le pagine del destino per Marie-Yvonne (Italian)
Mille note di poesia per Yvonne (Italian)
No me lo digas con flores (Spanish)
plot: Makino Tsukushi: a girl who comes from a poor family just wants to get through her 2 last years at Eitoku Gakuen, quietly. But once she makes herself known by standing up for her friend to the F4, the 4 most popular, powerful and rich boys at the school. She gets the red card: F4's way of a "Declaration of War". But when she doesnt let herself be beaten by them and is starting to fall for one of the F4; Hanazawa Rui. She starts to see that there is more than meets the eye...
opening_theme: "Futsuu no Nichiyoubi ni (An Ordinary Sunday)" by Tomohiko Kikuta
ending_theme: "Kenka no Ato de" by Tomohiko Kikuta
